subject: Basketball
Deaths (Obituaries)
lead_paragraph: Mr. Traylor, 34, who played seven seasons in the N.B.A. and whose wide frame earned him the nickname Tractor, was found dead in his apartment in Puerto Rico.
snippet: Mr. Traylor, 34, who played seven seasons in the N.B.A. and whose wide frame earned him the nickname Tractor, was found dead in his apartment in Puerto Rico.
